title: Quarkus 2.0.0.Final released - Vert.x 4, MicroProfile 4, Continuous Testing and much more
content: The Quarkus team is proud to announce the availability of the Final release of Quarkus 2.0. This version has been a gigantic effort to bring Quarkus to a whole new level, while keeping its roots: fast boot, low memory usage and developer joy. A big thank you to everyone involved...
